Package com.google.appinventor.components.annotations

Enum Summary
PropertyCategory Categories for Simple properties.
 

Annotation Types Summary
DesignerComponent Annotation to mark components for use in the ODE visual designer and Codeblocks.
DesignerProperty Annotation to mark properties to be visible in the ODE visual designer.
SimpleEvent Annotation to mark Simple event definitions.
SimpleFunction Annotation to mark Simple functions.
SimpleObject Annotation to mark Simple objects.
SimpleProperty Annotation to mark Simple properties.
SimplePropertyCopier Annotation to mark Simple property copiers.
UsesPermissions Annotation to indicate Android permissions required by components.
